message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $8000.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $9000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm afraid I can't go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10500. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $10500 is closer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my target. Would you consider $9500? This would be a good compromise for both of us.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I'm still not comfortable selling the product at $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $11000.  I'm still trying to get closer to my budget.  Would you be willing to consider $9800? This would be a very fair price, given that we've both made concessions.

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product at $9800. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11500. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value you'll get from the product.
